long_description: Grab the 3-point Patagonia Atom Sling daypack and split! It offers the support of a daypack and the hands-free convenience of a courier bag. Teardrop shape provides the support of a daypack by positioning the load behind your shoulder, and the single strap design makes getting the goods simple: just spin it around. Large zippered main pocket has zippered mesh and stretch-woven pockets inside to organize small items. When you need the Atom Sling to remaim close to your torso, pull out the foldaway waistbelt; it's perfect for biking and hiking. Convenient, zippered pocket on the shoulder strap has a soft lining to protect valuables. Breathable, moisture-moving 3D spacer mesh pads the shoulder straps and back panel to keep you cool; it also dries quick quickly. Made of 420-denier nylon oxford plain weave with an 840-denier ballistics nylon bottom; all fabrics are treated with a Durable Water Repellent finish.
short_description: Grab the 3-point Patagonia Atom Sling daypack and split! It offers the support of a daypack and the hands-free convenience of a courier bag.
